option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, Rate, Tag, Button, Row, Col, Image, Carousel, Divider, Tabs } from 'antd'; import { EnvironmentOutlined, WifiOutlined, CarOutlined, SwimmingPoolOutlined, RestOutlined, StarOutlined, CalendarOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import './PalmGardenResort.scss'; const PalmGardenResort = () => { const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState(null); const hotelData = { id: 7, name: "Palm Garden Resort Da Nang", location: "Non Nuoc Beach, Da Nang - 5 km to Marble Mountains", price: "₫2,050,000", oldPrice: "₫3,800,000", discount: "-46%", rating: 5, score: 9.1, review: "Wonderful", reviewCount: 3810, offers: ["Private beach", "Spa", "Family friendly"], images: [ "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/33985059/-1/69c240730e90112a2afc26aa668014a4.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x", "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/124/12403/12403_17042115370052509397.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=1024x", "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/124/12403/12403_17042115380052509398.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=1024x", "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/124/12403/12403_17042115390052509399.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=1024x", "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/124/12403/12403_17042115400052509400.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=1024x" ], description: "Palm Garden Resort Da Nang is a luxury beachfront resort located on the pristine Non Nuoc Beach. This 5-star resort offers world-class amenities including a private beach, multiple swimming pools, spa services, and family-friendly facilities. The resort is perfectly positioned near the famous Marble Mountains and offers stunning ocean views.", amenities: [ { icon: , name: "Free Wi-Fi" }, { icon: , name: "Swimming Pool" }, { icon: , name: "Free Parking" }, { icon: , name: "Spa & Wellness" }, { icon: , name: "Private Beach" }, { icon: , name: "24/7 Front Desk" } ], rooms: [ { type: "Deluxe Garden View", size: "45 sqm", capacity: "2 adults", price: "₫1,850,000", amenities: ["Garden view", "King bed", "Free Wi-Fi", "Air conditioning"] }, { type: "Ocean View Suite", size: "65 sqm", capacity: "2 adults + 1 child", price: "₫2,050,000", amenities: ["Ocean view", "Balcony", "Living area", "Mini bar"] }, { type: "Family Villa", size: "120 sqm", capacity: "4 adults + 2 children", price: "₫3,500,000", amenities: ["Private pool", "Kitchen", "2 bedrooms", "Terrace"] } ], reviews: [ { author: "Minh T.", rating: 5, date: "March 2024", comment: "Absolutely stunning resort! The private beach is amazing and the staff service is exceptional. Perfect for family vacation." }, { author: "Sarah L.", rating: 4, date: "February 2024", comment: "Beautiful location with great facilities. The spa treatments were very relaxing. Would definitely come back!" }, { author: "David K.", rating: 5, date: "January 2024", comment: "Outstanding experience! The food was delicious and the ocean view rooms are breathtaking." } ] }; const tabItems = [ { key: '1', label: 'Overview', children: (

About Palm Garden Resort Da Nang

{hotelData.description}

Hotel Amenities

{hotelData.amenities.map((amenity, index) => (
{amenity.icon} {amenity.name}
))}
), }, { key: '2', label: 'Rooms', children: (
{hotelData.rooms.map((room, index) => (

{room.type}

Size: {room.size}

Capacity: {room.capacity}

{room.amenities.map((amenity, idx) => ( {amenity} ))}
{room.price}
per night
 ))}
), }, { key: '3', label: 'Reviews', children: (
{hotelData.score}
{hotelData.review}
{hotelData.reviewCount} reviews
{hotelData.reviews.map((review, index) => (
{review.author} {review.date}

{review.comment}

 ))}
), }, ]; return (
{/* Header Section */}

{hotelData.name}

{hotelData.location}
{hotelData.score} ({hotelData.reviewCount} reviews)
{hotelData.offers.map((offer, index) => ( {offer} ))}
{hotelData.oldPrice}
{hotelData.price}
{hotelData.discount}
+ FREE CANCELLATION
{/* Image Gallery */}
{hotelData.images.map((image, index) => (
))}
{/* Content Tabs */}
); }; export default PalmGardenResort;

import React from 'react'; import "./ListRoomSearch.scss"; import Search from '@/components/Search/Search'; import { Card, Rate, Slider, Tag } from 'antd'; import { EnvironmentOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const roomList = [ { id: 1, name: "Golden Lotus Grand Da Nang", location: "Phước Mỹ, Da Nang - 2.5 km to center", price: "₫1,454,250", oldPrice: "₫4,539,555", discount: "-69%", rating: 5, score: 9.3, review: "Exceptional", reviewCount: 7327, offers: ["Breakfast", "Free fitness center access", "World Tourism Day Sale"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/63227000/0/bb9bcb3b36fa90f9c77276bd89f883ae.jpg?ce=0&s=375x", }, { id: 2, name: "Cordial Grand Hotel", location: "An Hai Bac, Da Nang - 1.7 km to center", price: "₫505,172", oldPrice: "₫1,550,000", discount: "-67%", rating: 4, score: 8.4, review: "Excellent", reviewCount: 2031, offers: ["Breakfast", "Sea View", "Domestic Deal"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/64896973/0/ea760dc311d7749c106a56a6044e9760.jpeg?ce=0&s=375x", }, { id: 3, name: "Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang hotel", location: "Phuoc My, Da Nang - 2.5 km to center", price: "₫899,000", oldPrice: "₫1,800,000", discount: "-50%", rating: 4, score: 8.7, review: "Very Good", reviewCount: 4120, offers: ["Breakfast", "Swimming Pool", "Free Wi-Fi"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/219/2190907/2190907_17080417080054905485.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=375x", }, { id: 4, name: "Da Nang Central Luxury Hotel", location: "Hai Chau, Da Nang - 1 km to Dragon Bridge", price: "₫1,250,000", oldPrice: "₫2,500,000", discount: "-50%", rating: 5, score: 9.0, review: "Superb", reviewCount: 2950, offers: ["Free cancellation", "Gym", "Spa service"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/33985059/-1/77afd0c92c0bdee0d86e7bcf09b38d49.jpg?ce=0&s=208x117&ar=16x9", }, { id: 5, name: "Ocean View Boutique Hotel", location: "Son Tra, Da Nang - 3 km to city center", price: "₫620,000", oldPrice: "₫1,200,000", discount: "-48%", rating: 3, score: 7.9, review: "Good", reviewCount: 1765, offers: ["Breakfast", "Near Beach", "Airport Shuttle"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/property/33985059/856131796/d7ef0d1e446f99a4baba959fb13bae76.jpeg?ce=0&s=208x117&ar=16x9", }, { id: 6, name: "Melia Vinpearl Danang Riverfront", location: "An Hai Bac, Da Nang - 0.4 km to center", price: "₫770,000", oldPrice: "₫1,400,000", discount: "-45%", rating: 4, score: 8.1, review: "Very Good", reviewCount: 2209, offers: ["Breakfast included", "Free parking", "Rooftop Bar"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/4947690/-1/f5dd1db7b2125faf6a1210227979f529.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x", }, { id: 7, name: "Palm Garden Resort Da Nang", location: "Non Nuoc Beach, Da Nang - 5 km to Marble Mountains", price: "₫2,050,000", oldPrice: "₫3,800,000", discount: "-46%", rating: 5, score: 9.1, review: "Wonderful", reviewCount: 3810, offers: ["Private beach", "Spa", "Family friendly"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/33985059/-1/69c240730e90112a2afc26aa668014a4.jpg?ce=0&s=208x117&ar=16x9", }, ]; const ListRoomSearch = () => { const handleHotelClick = (room) => { console.log("Clicked room:", room); }; return ( <>
{/* Sidebar trái (bộ lọc) */}

Hotels

{/* Budget */}

Budget (per night)

-{" "}

300.000 ₫ - 5.000.000 ₫

{/* Giá mỗi đêm */}

Budget (per night)

{/* Hạng sao */}

Rating

{/* Tiện nghi */}

{/* Vị trí */}

Location

{/* Đánh giá */}

Evaluate

{/* Phần chính giữa */}

Search Results

{roomList.map((room) => ( handleHotelClick(room)} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }} > {/* Bên trái: ảnh */}
{room.score}
{/* Bên phải: thông tin */}

{room.name}

{room.location}
{room.offers.map((offer, idx) => ( {offer} ))}
{room.oldPrice} {room.price} {room.discount}

+ FREE CANCELLATION

{room.score} {room.review}

{room.reviewCount} reviews

 ))}
{/* Phân trang */}
); }; export default ListRoomSearch;

2.5 km to center", price: "₫1,454,250", oldPrice: "₫4,539,555", discount: "-69%", rating: 5, score: 9.3, review: "Exceptional", reviewCount: 7327, offers: ["Breakfast", "Free fitness center access", "World Tourism Day Sale"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/63227000/0/bb9bcb3b36fa90f9c77276bd89f883ae.jpg?ce=0&s=375x", }, { id: 2, name: "Cordial Grand Hotel", location: "An Hai Bac, Da Nang - 1.7 km to center", price: "₫505,172", oldPrice: "₫1,550,000", discount: "-67%", rating: 4, score: 8.4, review: "Excellent", reviewCount: 2031, offers: ["Breakfast", "Sea View", "Domestic Deal"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/64896973/0/ea760dc311d7749c106a56a6044e9760.jpeg?ce=0&s=375x", }, { id: 3, name: "Muong Thanh Luxury Da Nang hotel", location: "Phuoc My, Da Nang - 2.5 km to center", price: "₫899,000", oldPrice: "₫1,800,000", discount: "-50%", rating: 4, score: 8.7, review: "Very Good", reviewCount: 4120, offers: ["Breakfast", "Swimming Pool", "Free Wi-Fi"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/219/2190907/2190907_17080417080054905485.jpg?ca=6&ce=1&s=375x", }, { id: 4, name: "Da Nang Central Luxury Hotel", location: "Hai Chau, Da Nang - 1 km to Dragon Bridge", price: "₫1,250,000", oldPrice: "₫2,500,000", discount: "-50%", rating: 5, score: 9.0, review: "Superb", reviewCount: 2950, offers: ["Free cancellation", "Gym", "Spa service"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/33985059/-1/77afd0c92c0bdee0d86e7bcf09b38d49.jpg?ce=0&s=208x117&ar=16x9", }, { id: 5, name: "Ocean View Boutique Hotel", location: "Son Tra, Da Nang - 3 km to city center", price: "₫620,000", oldPrice: "₫1,200,000", discount: "-48%", rating: 3, score: 7.9, review: "Good", reviewCount: 1765, offers: ["Breakfast", "Near Beach", "Airport Shuttle"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/property/33985059/856131796/d7ef0d1e446f99a4baba959fb13bae76.jpeg?ce=0&s=208x117&ar=16x9", }, { id: 6, name: "Melia Vinpearl Danang Riverfront", location: "An Hai Bac, Da Nang - 0.4 km to center", price: "₫770,000", oldPrice: "₫1,400,000", discount: "-45%", rating: 4, score: 8.1, review: "Very Good", reviewCount: 2209, offers: ["Breakfast included", "Free parking", "Rooftop Bar"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/4947690/-1/f5dd1db7b2125faf6a1210227979f529.jpg?ce=0&s=1024x", }, { id: 7, name: "Palm Garden Resort Da Nang", location: "Non Nuoc Beach, Da Nang - 5 km to Marble Mountains", price: "₫2,050,000", oldPrice: "₫3,800,000", discount: "-46%", rating: 5, score: 9.1, review: "Wonderful", reviewCount: 3810, offers: ["Private beach", "Spa", "Family friendly"], image: "https://pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/33985059/-1/69c240730e90112a2afc26aa668014a4.jpg?ce=0&s=208x117&ar=16x9", }, ]; const ListRoomSearch = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleHotelClick = (room) => { console.log("Clicked room:", room); // Điều hướng đến trang chi tiết khách sạn với ID tương ứng navigate(`/hotel/${room.id}`); }; return ( <>
{/* Sidebar trái (bộ lọc) */}

Hotels

{/* Budget */}

-{" "}

{roomList.map((room) => ( handleHotelClick(room)} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }} > {/* Bên trái: ảnh */}

 ))}
{/* Phân trang */}
); }; export default ListRoomSearch;
